headline: Why Are Coinbase (COIN) Shares Soaring Today
summary: Shares of blockchain infrastructure company Coinbase (NASDAQ:COIN) jumped 6.6% in the afternoon session after stocks tied to digital assets surged as Bitcoin, the world's largest cryptocurrency by market cap, reached a new all-time high, edging past the $110,000 mark.

raw.headline: Why Are Coinbase (COIN) Shares Soaring Today

headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Coinbase Stock Climbs as Cryptocurrency Prices Surge
summary: The S&P 500 slipped less than 0.1% on Thursday, May 22, after the House narrowly passed the Republicans' "big beautiful" tax and spending bill.

raw.headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Coinbase Stock Climbs as Cryptocurrency Prices Surge
raw.summary: The S&P 500 slipped less than 0.1% on Thursday, May 22, after the House narrowly passed the Republicans' "big beautiful" tax and spending bill.

headline: Bitcoin hovers near $111,000 as crypto momentum grows
summary: Bitcoin hovered near an all-time high again on Thursday thanks to a combination of US debt concerns and looser regulations.

raw.headline: Bitcoin hovers near $111,000 as crypto momentum grows

headline: Bitcoin and crypto stocks rally, solar stocks hit, IonQ surges
summary: Yahoo Finance host Brad Smith tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including crypto-related stocks rallying behind bitcoin's climb to a new record-high above $111,000, solar stocks continue to sink as President Trump's budget bill could phase out clean energy tax credits, and IonQ (IONQ) surges after CEO Niccolo de Masi stated his mission to become the Nvidia (NVDA) of quantum computing. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Bitcoin’s Record Prices Lift Coinbase, Robinhood, Other Crypto Stocks
summary: STOCKSTOWATCHTODAY BLOG  Crypto-related stocks rose early Thursday while stock futures were trading largely flat, after the world’s largest cryptocurrency Bitcoin hit a record high.  Crypto exchanges Coinbase Global  and Robinhood Markets rose 2.

headline: Bitcoin Price Sets New Intraday Record
summary: The price of bitcoin rose to a fresh peak near $112,000, extending a recent rally.  The digital token rose as high as $111,875 in overnight trading, according to the CoinDesk Bitcoin Price Index.   It recently stood a little lower, at about $110,500.

headline: Coinbase hack reveals crypto vulnerability to old-school crime: Bribery
summary: Coinbase often touts that it is "building the financial system of the future," but last week the cryptocurrency exchange made a disclosure that highlighted how vulnerable it was to a very old-fashioned form of crime.
